message.content: {"steps":[{"output":"[KR] Step 1 [삼각 함수의 범위 사용]: \\( \\frac{\\pi}{2} < \\theta < \\pi \\)이므로 \\( \\cos \\theta < 0 \\)입니다.","explanation":"주어진 범위에서 \\( \\theta \\)는 제2사분면에 위치하므로, \\( \\cos \\theta \\)는 음수입니다."},{"output":"[KR] Step 2 [삼각 함수의 기본 항등식 사용]: \\( \\sin^2 \\theta + \\cos^2 \\theta = 1 \\)을 사용하여 \\( \\cos \\theta \\)를 구합니다.","explanation":"\\( \\sin \\theta = \\frac{\\sqrt{21}}{7} \\)이므로 \\( \\sin^2 \\theta = \\left(\\frac{\\sqrt{21}}{7}\\right)^2 = \\frac{21}{49} \\). 따라서 \\( \\cos^2 \\theta = 1 - \\frac{21}{49} = \\frac{28}{49} \\)."},{"output":"[KR] Step 3 [음수 조건 적용]: \\( \\cos \\theta = -\\frac{4\\sqrt{7}}{7} \\)입니다.","explanation":"\\( \\cos^2 \\theta = \\frac{28}{49} = \\left(\\frac{4\\sqrt{7}}{7}\\right)^2 \\)이고, \\( \\cos \\theta < 0 \\)이므로 \\( \\cos \\theta = -\\frac{4\\sqrt{7}}{7} \\)입니다."},{"output":"[KR] Step 4 [탄젠트 정의 사용]: \\( \\tan \\theta = \\frac{\\sin \\theta}{\\cos \\theta} \\)를 계산합니다.","explanation":"\\( \\tan \\theta = \\frac{\\frac{\\sqrt{21}}{7}}{-\\frac{4\\sqrt{7}}{7}} = -\\frac{\\sqrt{21}}{4\\sqrt{7}} = -\\frac{\\sqrt{3}}{4} \\)."},{"output":"[EN] Step 1 [Using the range of trigonometric functions]: Since \\( \\frac{\\pi}{2} < \\theta < \\pi \\), \\( \\cos \\theta < 0 \\).","explanation":"In the given range, \\( \\theta \\) is in the second quadrant, so \\( \\cos \\theta \\) is negative."},{"output":"[EN] Step 2 [Using the Pythagorean identity]: Use \\( \\sin^2 \\theta + \\cos^2 \\theta = 1 \\) to find \\( \\cos \\theta \\).","explanation":"Given \\( \\sin \\theta = \\frac{\\sqrt{21}}{7} \\), so \\( \\sin^2 \\theta = \\left(\\frac{\\sqrt{21}}{7}\\right)^2 = \\frac{21}{49} \\). Thus, \\( \\cos^2 \\theta = 1 - \\frac{21}{49} = \\frac{28}{49} \\)."},{"output":"[EN] Step 3 [Applying the negative condition]: \\( \\cos \\theta = -\\frac{4\\sqrt{7}}{7} \\).","explanation":"Since \\( \\cos^2 \\theta = \\frac{28}{49} = \\left(\\frac{4\\sqrt{7}}{7}\\right)^2 \\) and \\( \\cos \\theta < 0 \\), \\( \\cos \\theta = -\\frac{4\\sqrt{7}}{7} \\)."},{"output":"[EN] Step 4 [Using the definition of tangent]: Calculate \\( \\tan \\theta = \\frac{\\sin \\theta}{\\cos \\theta} \\).","explanation":"\\( \\tan \\theta = \\frac{\\frac{\\sqrt{21}}{7}}{-\\frac{4\\sqrt{7}}{7}} = -\\frac{\\sqrt{21}}{4\\sqrt{7}} = -\\frac{\\sqrt{3}}{4} \\)."}],"final_answer":"\\MC: boxed{2}"}
